adjectives.description: nightmary (comparative more nightmary, superlative most nightmary)

entries.meaning: Characterized by, beset by, or resembling, nightmares.
examples: I am very well in spite of a restless and nightmary night. I kept dreaming about the Lord Mayoralty and seeing Brooks' bald head in my seat and half awake kept wishing and wishing I were back again.
